code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/notes';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};var create=function create(newObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};
